column1: #Text=US White House correspondent Helen Thomas retires
#Text=Veteran White House journalist Helen Thomas , 89 , announced her retirement yesterday with immediate effect , ending her fifty-seven year career , amid criticism over controversial remarks .
#Text=Thomas has been a correspondent for over fifty years and has covered every president from John F. Kennedy to Obama .

#Text=Thomas , the daughter of Lebanese immigrants , who blazed a trail for female reporters in politics in the United States , has ended her career after apologizing for saying that Israel should " get the hell out of Palestine .
